title: Bug 117260Set a hyperlink and link to an internal file, it pops up error message.
description: Description: Set a hyperlink and link to an internal file, it pops up error message.Steps to reproduce:1.Add a label and set hyperlink.2.Select "URI" and select a JPG file from file system.3.Preview in html and click on the label.4.Error message pops up and said "can't find file".
OB: Bug 117260Set a hyperlink and link to an internal file, it pops up error message.
